entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a character in the story who has a tense voice and looks anxious.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story who knows about Sirius Black and Voldemort.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius Black is a person mentioned by Harry as being potentially worse than Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a person mentioned by Harry and Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a person who thinks Harry is not made of strong stuff.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley knows that Harry already knows about Sirius Black.
Harry compares Voldemort to Sirius Black.
Mr. Weasley has a broken word with Fudge.
